apple_vendor_description: Depicted on Apple devices, a woman with a medium-dark skin tone enjoys a moment of relaxation in a steamy room, her figure softened by gentle, diffused light and Apple's characteristic smooth gradients. Wisps of steam curl around her, creating an atmosphere of tranquility and rejuvenation, with realistic lighting that enhances the sense of immersion. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, beautifully represents self-care, wellness, and the peaceful escape of a spa experience.
